amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enforce the proposed rule issued by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish regulatory standards regarding disparate impact liability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by HUD to finalize new rule to establish disparate impact standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Garrett.
